translations: adj.最卑鄙的；最低劣的（base的最高级）

sentences.sentence: Why has an entire world become so captivated by its basest behavior?
sentences.translation: 为什么整个世界都在为如此卑劣的行为而着迷？

sentences.sentence: He must learn them again, he must teach himself that the basest of all things is to be afraid.
sentences.translation: 他一定要重新认识这些问题。他必须使自己明白世间最可鄙的事情莫过于恐惧。

sentences.sentence: He traveled to the Sith world of Ziost, where the energy of the dark side tempted him to give in to his basest instincts.
sentences.translation: 本来到西斯的星球锡奥斯特，在那里，黑暗面的能量引诱他屈服于最原始的本能。
